name: Gorilla War Cry
originalText:
Cast Gorilla War Cry only during combat before blockers are declared.
Attacking creatures can't be blocked this turn except by two or more creatures.
Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

rulings.text: If a turn has multiple combat phases, this spell can be cast during any of them as long as it’s before the beginning of that phase’s Declare Blockers Step.

text:
Cast this spell only during combat before blockers are declared.
All creatures gain menace until end of turn. (They can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
